name: Unnamed Rhythm Game
description:
Unnamed Rhythm Game (URG) is a 2D reflex rhythm game where beats move down form the top of the screen and you move your player icon left and right to SMASH the beats to the sound of the music.

Unnamed Rhythm Game (URG) is a 2D reflex rhythm game developed by 1 person, Zakary Loney. It was made in Unity for PCs and Mobile devices. The game-play is fairly simple 3 different (Single Beat, Hold Beat, and Wall Beat) types of beats fall from the top of the screen to the bottom. YOU move your player icon with the keyboard and hit the beats to SMASH them in bits.

Beats:
Single Beat: A single square you hit. Hold Beat: A Bunch of single beats in a line (The line totals to one point). Wall Beat: A wall will fall and you have to position your self to avoid it.

Songs:
Earthquake - Teminite, Megalovania - Toby Fox, Waifu - S3RL, Witch Doctor - Cartoons, Friendzoned - S3RL, Escape - S3RL, Halo Theme - Bungie, Space Battle - F-777, Faded - Alan Walker, Unity - TheFatRat, The Seven Seas - F-777, and more to come
